one of the things that happens when you

to get kind of muted so what she did is
she actually created a simple syrup with

around because if you let them just sit
they'll actually burn on the bottom and
then you should start to smell them yeah

coarse all the oils that come out and

it's a really super concentrated syrup

we're gonna pop the lid on these guys
stick them in the freezer for about an

you want the ice crystals to form just
